hero.headline: Building the Future of Papua New Guinea
hero.subheadline: Bridging the gap between traditional craftsmanship and contemporary efficiency. Expert project management and uncompromising quality from the heart of Lae.

about.headline: Homegrown Excellence, International Standards
about.description: Established in 2022 in the industrial heart of Lae, we are a modern firm born from a deep understanding of Morobe Province's unique landscape. We understand the logistical and environmental demands of the region, ensuring every project is built to last.

director.name: Jerry Maralit
director.title: Director
director.bio: With over 19 years of hands-on experience in PNG's construction and engineering sector, Mr. Maralit brings a wealth of local expertise and strategic vision. He has a proven track record of delivering projects under demanding conditions across the Momase and Highlands regions.
